name: morpheus-engine
description: Modular LLM narrative game engine monorepo

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:module-intent" "npm run dev:module-loremaster" "npm run dev:module-simulator" "npm run dev:module-arbiter" "npm run dev:module-proser"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/backend dev
scripts.dev:module-intent: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/module-intent dev
scripts.dev:module-loremaster: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/module-loremaster dev
scripts.dev:module-simulator: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/module-default-simulator dev
scripts.dev:module-arbiter: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/module-arbiter dev
scripts.dev:module-proser: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/module-proser dev
scripts.test: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run -w @morpheus/backend build && node --test
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w @morpheus/shared build && npm run --workspaces --if-present typecheck
